notes: To fight one, you must kill a regular [[White Deer]]. If the deer doesn't become [[Desperate White Deer|desperate]], it will enrage. Good for [[training]] since they aren't too strong and heal themselves regularly. You can find a safe zone and another monster to train your [[shielding]]. Can be [[Kingly Deer|tamed]] by using a [[Golden Fir Cone]] or a [[Music Box]] on it.
name: Enraged White Deer
behaviour: Attacks the character that killed it as a normal [[White Deer]].
location: Same as [[White Deer]]: around [[Ab'Dendriel]], Carlin (east from [[Lothar]]), [[Femor Hills]] and [[Ferngrims Gate]].
strategy: It is not very strong, just kill it. Be careful though, as two [[Elf Scout]]s might spawn after killing it to avenge its death.
